author: lu_pinto
content: if there are too many bugs around that, I agree that it doesn't pay off. But implementing TXCREATE in devnet-1 might show a slow down on progress to the community since you already layed out the plan. No clients have TXCREATE and the new initcode transaction type right?

author: _shemnon
content: One advantage to txcreate in devnet-1 is with the next devnet all devnets are "shippable" as all community requested features are additive at that point.
